column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ n'esuafo duebien no baa ne nkyɛn no
column3: ɔmaa hɔn tum wɔ esunsum fi do

column2: "Na esuafo duebien no hɔn edzin nye yinom: dza odzi kan no
column3: Simon a wɔfrɛ no Peter

column2: "Filip nye Bartholomew; Tomas nye Matthew towgyenyi no; James
column3: Alfaeus ba no

column2: "Simon Kanannyi
column3: nye Judas Iskariot a oyii no mae no so."

column2: "Duebien yi na Jesus somaa hɔn
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnkɔ amanaman kwan no mu
column5: eso mma hom nnhɛn Samariafo kurow biara mu:"

column2: "na mbom hom nkɔ Israel fie nguan a wɔayew no nkyɛn."
"Na hom kɔ a
column3: hom nkɛka dɛ

column2: "Hom nsa ayarfo yarba
column3: hom nnyan ewufo
column5: hom ntu mbɔnsam: hom enya no kwa: hom mfa mma kwa."

column2: "Mma hom mmfa sika
column3: anaa dwɛɛtɛɛ
column4: anaa kɔɔber nngu hom abɔdo mu;"

column2: "mma hom mmfa bɔtɔ
column3: anaa sorntar ebien
column5: anaa poma: osiandɛ ɔfata odwumayɛnyi dɛ odzidzi."

column2: "Na kurow anaa ekurobaase biara a hom bɛhɛn mu no
column3: hom nhwehwɛ nyia ɔsɛ wɔ hɔ; na hɔ na hom ntsena nkodu dɛ hom befi hɔ akɔ."

column2: "Na sɛ hom rehɛn ofi no mu a
column3: hom nkyia."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔyɛ fie a ɔfata a
column3: hom asomdwee nka no
column5: hom asomdwee nsan mbra hom hɔ."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔnnkɛgye hom anaa onnketsie hom asɛm no
column3: hom fi ofi anaa kurow no mu rokɔ a

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ atsɛmbu da no mu dza ɔbɛba dɛm kurow no do no bɛsen dza ɔbaa Sodom nye Gomora do no."
"Hwɛ
column3: mosoma hom dɛ nguan wɔ mpataku finimfin: dɛm ntsi hom nyɛ enyansafo dɛ nwɔ
column4: na hom nyɛ krɔnn dɛ mbubur."

column2: "Na hom nhwɛ yie wɔ nyimpa ho; osiandɛ wobeyi hom akɔ mpanyimfo bagua mu
column3: na wɔaka hom mpire wɔ hɔn nhyiamudan mu;"

column2: "na eso wɔdze hom bɔkɔ ambradofo nye ahemfo enyim wɔ me ntsi
column3: dze eedzi dase ama hɔn nye amanaman."

column2: "Na sɛ woyi hom ma a
column3: mma hom nndwendwen mbrɛ hom bɛyɛ
column5: na wɔdze dza hom bɛka bɛma hom dɔn no ara mu."

column2: "Na nnyɛ hom na hom kasa
column3: na hom Egya no Sunsum na ɔkasa wɔ hom mu."

column2: "Na nua beyi nua ama owu
column3: egya beyi ba ama; na mba bɔsoɛr wɔ awofo do na wɔama woeku hɔn."

column2: "Na nyimpa nyina bɛtan hom wɔ me dzin ntsi: na nyia ɔbɛtsena mu ekodu ewiei no
column3: ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔtseetsee hom wɔ kurow yi mu a
column3: hom nguan nkɔ fofor mu; na nokwar mese hom dɛ
column4: Hom nnkowie Israel nkurow nyina do kɔ ansaana Nyimpa Ba no aba."

column2: "Osuanyi nnkyɛn ne kyerɛkyerɛfo
column3: na akowaa nnkyɛn no wura."

column2: "Ɔdɔɔ so ma osuanyi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛ ne Kyerɛkyerɛfo
column3: na akowaa dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛ no wura. Na sɛ wɔafrɛ ofiwura no Beelzebul a
column4: ebɛn edzin ara na wɔnnkɛfa afrɛ ne fifo!"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nnsuro hɔn: na biribi do nnkatae a worinnyi no edzi
column3: na onnhuntae a worunnhu."

column2: "Dza meka kyerɛ hom wɔ sum mu no
column3: hom nka no kan mu; na dza hom tse no asomu no
column4: hom mpaa mu nka no adan etsifi."

column2: "Na mma hom nnsuro hɔn a woku nyimpadua no
column3: na ɔkra dze
column4: wonntum nnku no: na mbom hom nsuro nyia obotum asɛɛ ɔkra nye nyimpadua nyina wɔ amandzehu kurow mu."

column2: "Ana wɔnntɔn nsorɔm ebien nngye pɛsewa? Naaso hɔn mu kor mpo nnkokwetsir hom Egya ahwe famu."
"Na hom tsinhwi mpo wɔakan ne nyina."
"Dɛm ntsi mma hom nnsuro: na hom som bo kyɛn nsorɔm pii."
"Dɛm ntsi obiara a ɔbɔbɔ me dzin wɔ nyimpa enyim no
column3: ɔno na mo so mobobɔ ne dzin wɔ m'Egya a ɔwɔ sor n'enyim."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛpa me wɔ nyimpa enyim no
column3: ɔno na mo so mebɛpa no m'Egya a ɔwɔ sor n'enyim."

column2: "Mma hom nndwen dɛ mebae mobɔsomaa asomdwee wɔ asaase do: mammba mammbɔsoma asomdwee
column3: na mbom nkrantsee a."

column2: "Na mebae mebɛpaapaa mu ma banyin nye n'egya eenya
column3: babaa nye ne na eenya

column2: "na nyimpa n'atamfo bɛyɛ ne fifo."
"Nyia ɔdɔ egya anaa na kyɛn me no
column3: ɔmmfata me; na nyia ɔdɔ babanyin anaa babaa kyɛn me no

column2: "Na nyia ɔmmfa ne mbeamudua na ɔnnka mo do no
column3: ɔmmfata me."

column2: "Nyia ɔdɔ no nkwa no
column3: ɔbɛyew no; na nyia ɔyew no nkwa wɔ me ntsi no

column2: "Nyia ɔgye hom no
column3: ɔgye me; na nyia ɔgye me no

column2: "Nyia ɔgye nkɔnhyɛnyi wɔ nkɔnhyɛnyi dzin mu no
column3: obenya nkɔnhyɛnyi akatua; na nyia ɔgye ɔtseneneenyi wɔ ɔtseneneenyi dzin mu no

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛma nketseaba yi mu baako nsunwin kɔɔpow ma mpo wɔ osuanyi dzin mu no
column3: nokwar mese hom dɛ n'akatua rommbɔ no."
